name: Mommy's Wedding Day Makeover Salon - Hair spa care, makeup & dressup games
name_original: Mommy's Wedding Day Makeover Salon - Hair spa care, makeup & dressup games
description:
Mommy needs to be dressed for her Christmas eve wedding day! Can you help these beautiful mommies?

Features
** Spa Section
** Makeup Section
** Dress up Section
** 4 mommies to choose

Make this her dream day!
